article.title: Welcome to the South Dakota U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.summary: Learn more about the South Dakota U.S. Export Assistance Center.
article.content:
​Are you interested in selling internationally?

The U.S. Commercial Service can help you:

  • Research new international markets
  • Find qualified international buyers and distributors
  • Promote your company at trade events around the world
  • Receive help through every step of the export process

The U.S. Commercial Service is a federal government agency helping companies succeed in exporting. The Sioux Falls office, serving businesses across South Dakota, is part of a global network of trade professionals. Our in-depth industry and tradecraft knowledge coupled with an array of exporting services allows us to specialize in providing customized international business solutions.​

PleaseContact Usfor help with your international trade questions and learn how we can help your company grow internationally.
article.seometadatatitle: Welcome to the South Dakota U.S. Export Assistance Center
article.seometadatadescription: Learn more about the South Dakota U.S. Export Assistance Center.
